name: places/ChIJ-4ie4PtYwokRSYwsY_Dpu14
formattedAddress: 266 W 53rd St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 266 W 53rd St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
We had a great experience with Galeria Art Framing. We originally wanted to get an old painting re-framed but Victor encouraged us to have the old frame, as well as the painting, restored instead. It was great advice since the frame had sentimental value - we just thought it was beyond repair.

Victor did a fantastic job restoring the whole piece and we are so happy with how it came out. His work is expensive but you can tell why that's so because the level of detail and precision is excellent.

Victor transported the piece for us and kept in touch throughout the process to keep us updated on the project, which was great. I would highly recommend his shop and especially his restoration services.

Victor transported the piece for us and kept in touch throughout the process to keep us updated on the project, which was great. I would highly recommend his shop and especially his restoration services.

originalText.text: Victor delivers high quality work, on time, and at a fair price.  More than that, though he offers excellent suggestions on appealing ways to frame your art.  Highly recommended, especially if you aren't sure how, precisely, you would like your piece framed.

text.text: Victor delivers high quality work, on time, and at a fair price.  More than that, though he offers excellent suggestions on appealing ways to frame your art.  Highly recommended, especially if you aren't sure how, precisely, you would like your piece framed.

originalText.text: The gallery I work for has been going to Victor and his team for years.  We often run to him at the last minute with artwork we need ready the next week, and he makes the extra effort to frame everything and frame it well just in time for us to have a beautiful installation to show.  He is very knowledgeable about art and has great recommendations for which frame type compliments each work best.  This is so important because not only does a good frame add value, but if a frame is unappealing it can negatively affect how a client perceives the work itself when we are trying to make a sale.  Victor and his team are always ready with solutions to any framing issues that come up.  He also has the most reasonable prices for such a high quality out of all of the framers we've worked with.

Victor and his team are always ready with solutions to any framing issues that come up.  He also has the most reasonable prices for such a high quality out of all of the framers we've worked with.

originalText.text:
I have had many many items framed at Galeria over the last ten years, and I have always had nothing but the best experience.

Recently I had a large tattered oil painting restored and framed by Galeria.  They did an absolutely fabulous job taking a large and very damaged artwork and restoring it to like-new condition.  I was extremely satisfied.

Galeria has also restored a frame for me and, using digital technology, re-created a hopelessly damaged etching to look indistinguishable from the original (but without the damage).

All around a terrific experience every time.

originalText.text: I found Galeria Art & Framing in 2009 from someone who created a painting for me. It was a canvas that I had no idea what to do with. Galeria wrapped it and gave it a "floating frame" for me. The craftsmanship was phenomenal, second to none. They spoke volumes of Victor (the owner). From the very beginning, he has displayed true professionalism, a great knowledge for art pieces in general, and an "eye" for what types of frames really work with certain pieces. I just got my most recent piece delivered by Victor himself just a little while ago (probably my fifth or sixth piece they've done in the past few years. I will go nowhere else. Thanks again, never disappoints!! The stuff in the store is truly magnificent.
